Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Six Pieces from Cinderella, op. 102

1944

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 21'

  • 1. Waltz (Cinderella and the Prince)
  • 2. Cinderella’s Variation
  • 3. The Quarrel
  • 4. Waltz (Cinderella’s Departure for the Ball)
  • 5. Pas-du-châle
  • 6. Amoroso

These pieces are arrangements of music from the ballet Cinderella (op. 87). Prokofiev also created three orchestral suites from the ballet: op. 107 (which includes nos. 3–5 of op. 102), op. 108 (which includes no. 1 of op. 102) and op. 109 (which includes no. 6 of op. 102). In his orchestral Waltz Suite (op. 110), Prokofiev included also versions of nos. 1 and 4 from op. 102.

1. Waltz (Cinderella and the Prince)

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Cinderella’s Variation

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

3. The Quarrel

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 4

4. Waltz (Cinderella’s Departure for the Ball)

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4

5. Pas-du-châle

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 4

6. Amoroso

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3.5
